docsTags.name: virtualProp
docsTags.text: {"ios" | "md"} mode - The mode determines which platform styles to use.

docsTags.name: part
docsTags.text: native - The native HTML button element that wraps all child elements.

docsTags.name: part
docsTags.text: indicator - The indicator displayed on the checked segment button.

docsTags.name: part
docsTags.text: indicator-background - The background element for the indicator displayed on the checked segment button.

props.name: disabled
props.docs: If `true`, the user cannot interact with the segment button.

props.name: layout
props.docs: Set the layout of the text and icon in the segment.

props.name: mode
props.docs: The mode determines which platform styles to use.

props.name: value
props.docs: The value of the segment button.

styles.name: --background
styles.docs: Background of the segment button

styles.name: --background-checked
styles.docs: Background of the checked segment button

styles.name: --background-focused
styles.docs: Background of the segment button when focused with the tab key

styles.name: --background-focused-opacity
styles.docs: Opacity of the segment button background when focused with the tab key

styles.name: --background-hover
styles.docs: Background of the segment button on hover

styles.name: --background-hover-opacity
styles.docs: Opacity of the segment button background on hover

styles.name: --border-color
styles.docs: Color of the segment button border

styles.name: --border-radius
styles.docs: Radius of the segment button border

styles.name: --border-style
styles.docs: Style of the segment button border

styles.name: --border-width
styles.docs: Width of the segment button border

styles.name: --color
styles.docs: Color of the segment button

styles.name: --color-checked
styles.docs: Color of the checked segment button

styles.name: --color-focused
styles.docs: Color of the segment button when focused with the tab key

styles.name: --color-hover
styles.docs: Color of the segment button on hover

styles.name: --indicator-box-shadow
styles.docs: Box shadow on the indicator for the checked segment button

styles.name: --indicator-color
styles.docs: Color of the indicator for the checked segment button

styles.name: --indicator-height
styles.docs: Height of the indicator for the checked segment button

styles.name: --indicator-transform
styles.docs: Transform of the indicator for the checked segment button

styles.name: --indicator-transition
styles.docs: Transition of the indicator for the checked segment button

styles.name: --margin-bottom
styles.docs: Bottom margin of the segment button

styles.name: --margin-end
styles.docs: Right margin if direction is left-to-right, and left margin if direction is right-to-left of the segment button

styles.name: --margin-start
styles.docs: Left margin if direction is left-to-right, and right margin if direction is right-to-left of the segment button

styles.name: --margin-top
styles.docs: Top margin of the segment button

styles.name: --padding-bottom
styles.docs: Bottom padding of the segment button

styles.name: --padding-end
styles.docs: Right padding if direction is left-to-right, and left padding if direction is right-to-left of the segment button

styles.name: --padding-start
styles.docs: Left padding if direction is left-to-right, and right padding if direction is right-to-left of the segment button

styles.name: --padding-top
styles.docs: Top padding of the segment button

styles.name: --transition
styles.docs: Transition of the segment button

parts.name: indicator
parts.docs: The indicator displayed on the checked segment button.

parts.name: indicator-background
parts.docs: The background element for the indicator displayed on the checked segment button.
